short_description.message: Critical Care Resource Management System for Salesforce

description.message:
As the COVID-19 pandemic continues to expand at an accelerated rate, the medical system is under significant strain, both from a staffing and resource perspective. Facilities have limited beds, equipment, and staff on hand to triage patients and there is no way to effectively communicate, inventory and ease the burden in overtaxed areas.

The Traction Thrive Critical Care Resource Management application enables hospitals and healthcare practitioners to more accurately track and distribute critical medical staff and resources to meet the immediate needs of COVID-19 response teams.

Learn more at [https://tractionondemand.com/traction-thrive/](https://tractionondemand.com/traction-thrive/)

Installation Guide available on Salesforce AppExchange: [https://appexchange.salesforce.com/appxListingDetail?listingId=a0N3A00000FMvlIUAT](https://appexchange.salesforce.com/appxListingDetail?listingId=a0N3A00000FMvlIUAT)

Open source public GitHub repository: [https://github.com/SFDO-Community/TractionThrive](https://github.com/SFDO-Community/TractionThrive)

![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/SFDO-Community/TractionThrive/master/assets/traction_thrive_logo-medium.png)

Customer Community Plus licenses are req.message: Please ensure you have Customer Community Plus licenses available prior to installing.

Please ensure you have Einstein Analytic.message: Please ensure you have Einstein Analytics Plus and Einstein Analytics for Community Logins licenses available prior to installing.

Please set the Internal and External Org.message: Please set the Internal and External Organization-Wide Defaults to Private for the Case object prior to installing.
Please set the Internal and External Organization-Wide Defaults to Private for the Opportunity object prior to installing.

Please set the External Organization-Wid.message: Please set the External Organization-Wide Defaults to Read or Private for the Account object prior to installing.

Set Case, Contact, and Opportunity OWD.message: Set Case, Contact, and Opportunity OWD
